archimate:Requirement.name: Escalation process is defined to ensure the content is up to date
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
This requirement was agreed with Hemant Chavan in the weekly project meeting 18/4.
Rationale: We need to ensure that the content is kept up to date, if the owner forgets to update, no longer wants to update or quits the company, we risk having invalid content in the repository.
